channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX is still causing flight delays years after a single rocket launch disrupted 563 planes
item.description: SpaceX’s Falcon Heavy launch in 2018 caused 4,645 minutes, or more than 77 hours, of commercial flight delays.

item.title: FDA bans red dye No. 3 from foods, supplements, and some medicines because of potential cancer risk
item.description: The agency said it was taking the action as a “matter of law” because some studies have found that the dye caused cancer in lab rats.

item.title: Crypto XRP reaches all-time high above $3. It now has $4-plus in its sights.
U.S. stocks finish sharply higher, helped by CPI data and plunging bond yields
Bitcoin rebounds to $100,000 as inflation data puts Fed rate cuts ‘back on the table’
item.description: The original cryptocurrency has risen 9% since hitting a 30-day low of $90,600.

item.title: Social Security cost-of-living adjustment could drop to just 2.1% for 2026
California wildfires could slow the economy and boost inflation, economists say
Social Security’s COLA is expected to drop in 2026 — but how low could it go?
How snack giant Mondelez is trying to keep pace in the fast-changing realm of AI, cybersecurity, and cloud
item.description: The company's CTO and CISO shares insight about managing a huge tech operation within a Fortune 500 business.

item.title: Trump and Biden both rush to take credit for the Gaza ceasefire. One expert calls it ‘ironic’
item.description: Biden said the agreement was the result of "dogged and painstaking American diplomacy." Trump said it only happened because he won the election.
